title: Clarendon Hills crepes shop a dream come true for owner
text: Clarendon Hills crepes shop a dream come true for owner Little Creperie Chuck Fieldman / Pioneer Press Savannah Wiklund, 3, of Clarendon Hills, held by her mother, Kristin, gives a Valentine's Day card to Christos Potsis at Little Creperie. Savannah Wiklund, 3, of Clarendon Hills, held by her mother, Kristin, gives a Valentine's Day card to Christos Potsis at Little Creperie. (Chuck Fieldman / Pioneer Press)
